rules.name: Main_App_is_not_Married_COP
rules.label: Main App is not Married COP

Flow.description:
Flow Description: Creates Bond Applicants and is launched from the Create Pre-Approval or Bond flow which is ultimately launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: missingQuestions
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.Marital_agreement__c}, ""), "Marital Agreement" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.In_what_capacity_are_you_buying__c}, ""), "In what capacity are you buying"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.Do_you_have_a_South_African_ID_number__c}, ""), "Do you have a South African ID"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.Nationality__c}, ""), "Nationality" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.What_is_your_employment_status__c}, ""), "Employment Status" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!loanApplicant.What_is_your_credit_status__c}, ""), "Credit Status" + BR(), null)

Flow.label: Add Bond Applicants

fields.name: colorTest
fields.fieldText:
Bond Opportunity successfully created:

  • Opportunity: {!Get_Bond_Opp.Name}

Main Applicant successfully created:

  • Customer Name: {!Get_Main_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant.Last_Name__c}
  • Phone: {!Get_Main_Applicant.Mobile_Phone_Number__c}
  • Email: {!Get_Main_Applicant.Email_Address__c}

fields.name: fourthApplicantTxt
fields.fieldText:
The fourth and final Co Applicant on the Bond Opportunity cannot be Married in Community of Property.


The maximum Co Applicants permitted will be exceeded as this marital agreement requires an additional spouse to be added

value.stringValue: Is the Co-Applicant a New or Existing Customer?

fields.name: copDisplayMain
fields.fieldText:
• A Spouse is mandatory as the marital agreement is: Married in Community of Property
  • Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Main_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: copDisplay
fields.fieldText:
• A Spouse is mandatory as the marital agreement is: Married in Community of Property
  • Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: errorDisp
fields.fieldText: You must select a customer to use the "Use Existing Customer" option

fields.name: txtHelp2
fields.fieldText: * If a Customer cannot be found, a new Person Account will be created based off of the information captured on the Next screen for the Co-Applicant

fields.name: mandatoryTxt_0
fields.fieldText: A Spouse is mandatory as the marital agreement is: Married in Community of Property

fields.name: addSpouse
fields.fieldText: Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Main_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: addSpouse2
fields.fieldText: Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: First_Name
fields.fieldText: First Name

fields.name: Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Last Name

fields.name: Mobile_Phone_Number
fields.fieldText: Mobile Phone Number

fields.name: Email_Address
fields.fieldText: Email Address

fields.name: textMsg_0
fields.fieldText: Phone or Email must be specified.

fields.name: coAppName
fields.fieldText: Co Applicant: {!coPersonAccount.FirstName} {!coPersonAccount.LastName}

fields.name: coAppExistTxt
fields.fieldText: Co Applicant: {!Get_Contact_Record_Existing_Person.FirstName} {!Get_Contact_Record_Existing_Person.LastName}

fields.name: requiredQuestions
fields.fieldText:
The following Interview questions are mandatory when converting to a Bond:

{!missingQuestions}

fields.name: copMarried
fields.fieldText: Marital Agreement: Married in Community of Property (COP)

fields.name: additionalIncome
fields.fieldText: Do you earn additional income from:

fields.name: displayTextMaximum
fields.fieldText: You have reached the maximum permitted applicants for this Bond Opportunity:

fields.name: marriedCOPDisplay2
fields.fieldText:
• A Spouse is mandatory as the marital agreement is: Married in Community of Property
  • Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Main_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: marriedCOPDisplay
fields.fieldText:
• A Spouse is mandatory as the marital agreement is: Married in Community of Property
  • Please be sure to add the spouse of applicant: {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Last_Created_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: First_Name1
fields.fieldText: First Name

validationRule.errorMessage: Only the first letter should be capital.

fields.name: firstnameRequired
fields.fieldText: First Name must be specified.

fields.name: Last_Name1
fields.fieldText: Last Name

fields.name: lastnameRequired
fields.fieldText: Last Name must be specified.

fields.fieldText: Phone

fields.fieldText: This phone number already exists on the system.

fields.name: duplicateEmail
fields.fieldText: This email address already exists on the system. Please look up the customer on the previous screen.

fields.fieldText: Phone or Email must be specified.
